About

My name is Burak and I am a PhD candidate in the Department of Medical Statistics at the University Medical Center GÃ¶ttingen. I am interested in Biostatistics, especially meta-analysis, Bayesian hierarchical modelling, INLA, R and writing. You can look at my Linkedin, my Twitter and my GitHub.

This blog is created by using knitr, servr, Jekyll, Hyde and RStudio. You can view the source code on GitHub.
